## choose() function

Choose between two nodes based on condition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function choose(condition: boolean, ifTrue: ViewNode, ifFalse: ViewNode): ViewNode;
```

<tr><td>

ifFalse


</td><td>

[ViewNode](./dsl.viewnode.md)


</td><td>

View node to render if condition is false


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ViewNode](./dsl.viewnode.md)

Either ifTrue or ifFalse depending on condition

## Remarks

Returns one node if the condition is true, another if false.

## Example


```typescript
vstack(
  choose(
    state.isLoading,
    text('Loading...').dim(),
    text('Ready!').bold()
  )
)
```
